name: A bad day to harvest - PostCompo
name_original: A bad day to harvest - PostCompo
description:
It’s the year 2030 and the climate has become very unstable, making it impossible to have a properly working farm. You are the last standing farmer and it's your you to save it. You have also been affected by climate change and your movements are not as they used to be, almost as if you don’t really have control over where to go next.

You play as a farmer who needs to protect their farm, use cards to move and cards to do actions.
